name: TapToEscape
description:
It is a simple casual game.

There are 50 phases, with the difficulties:

Iniciante (easy)
Normal (medium)
Difícil(difficult)
Muito Difícil (very difficult)
Impossível (impossible)

Controls: Just tap the screen to have the player reverse the direction.

Try to escape from enemies and reach the necessary score to advance to the next level.

The game is still in development. 

It will be released for Android.
